title: Zelenskyy backs energy ceasefire, Russia bombs Ukraine despite Trump intervention
summary_full: Despite Trump's claim, Moscow's forces launched dozens of drones and one missile at Ukraine overnight, according to the Ukrainian air force
summary_public: Despite Trump's claim, Moscow's forces launched dozens of drones and one missile at Ukraine overnight, according to the Ukrainian air force
